name: Basic Pascal
description:
Basic Pascal Pack

It is a pack of videogames and projects, made in programming languages Basic and Pascal. In a very different of their ways. Just like QBasic 64, Free Pascal, for example. All of these games you can find at my website, and read all description, screenshots and other cool stuff, like stories, for example.

So, because they are pretty small, and that’s why they are packed in such pack. So, first aim is to public these games with one whole pack at platforms GameJolt and Itchio.

All these games from this pack, they have its own page with description at authors website.

Pack will be updated with new programs and games.

Each game has its own page with description at authors website. Check it here

http://www.dimalink.tv-games.ru/videogames_eng.html

 

Todays, game list:

  • TierGun
  • FunMan
  • Alice Killer 71
  • Spider
  • Blind Maze
